cause.description:
The mission of Dance Place's Next Generation programs for youth is to assist youth in meeting the challenges they face through childhood and adolescence by providing innovative creative academic education, life skills and cultural experiences.
We offer innovative programs in dance, life-skills training, creative academic education and cultural experiences. Our programs enhance the lives of children and help them become responsible, creative and healthy adults.
1. Dance Place’s Next Generation Youth Programs were created to help our city's youth overcome the challenges they face through childhood and adolescence
2. Dance Place provides innovative programs in dance, life skills training, creative academic education and cultural experiences.
3. Our programs enhance the lives of children and help them become responsible, creative and healthy adults.
cause.mission: The mission of Dance Place is to transform lives through performing arts and creative education programs that inspire personal growth, physical wellnes and community engagement.
cause.name: Dance Place Next Generation
